level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor may promulgate rules consistent with this chapter.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 3-405, § 3-406, and § 3-407.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) addition of section, see § 2(c) of Funeral Services Temporary Amendment Act of 2000 (D.C. Law 13-219, April 3, 2001, law notification 48 DCR 3461).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 2(c) of Funeral Services Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-8, March 2, 2001, 48 DCR 2487).
